description.zh-cn: 中国共产党财经干部，毛泽东之弟。曾化名周彬在新疆工作，后被新疆军阀盛世才杀害。
description.en: A financial cadre of the Communist Party of China and the younger brother of Mao Zedong. He worked in Xinjiang under the alias Zhou Bin and was later killed by the Xinjiang warlord Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的主要创建者和领导人，毛泽民之兄。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, elder brother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民之弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民之父。
description.en: Father of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民之母。
description.en: Mother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民的第二任妻子。
description.en: Second wife of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民的第三任妻子。
description.en: Third wife of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民与王淑兰之女。
description.en: Daughter of Mao Zemin and Wang Shulan.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民与朱旦华之子。
description.en: Son of Mao Zemin and Zhu Danhua.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期新疆省的统治者，下令处决了毛泽民、陈潭秋、林基路等人。
description.en: Ruler of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era, who ordered the execution of Mao Zemin, Chen Tanqiu, Lin Jilu, and others.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国国民政府主席，批准对毛泽民等人处以极刑。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, who approved the death sentences for Mao Zemin and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，与毛泽民一同在新疆工作并被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who worked with Mao Zemin in Xinjiang and was killed alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，与毛泽民一同在新疆被杀害。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China who was killed in Xinjiang along with Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要领导人之一，曾设法营救毛泽民等人。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China, who attempted to rescue Mao Zemin and others.

description.zh-cn: 国民党高级将领，曾任新疆省主席，释放了被盛世才关押的部分中共党员。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the Kuomintang who served as the Chairman of Xinjiang Province and released some of the CCP members imprisoned by Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: A CCP member who defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: A CCP member who defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: A CCP member who defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东创办的学校，毛泽民曾在此学习。
description.en: A school founded by Mao Zedong where Mao Zemin once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期培养农民运动干部的机构。
description.en: An early institution of the Communist Party of China for training cadres for the peasant movement.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国的中央银行，由毛泽民负责筹建并担任首任行长。
description.en: The central bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic, established under the responsibility of Mao Zemin who served as its first governor.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，进行了长征。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which undertook the Long March.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃工农民主政府

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃工农民主政府

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国在长征到达陕北后的政府名称。
description.en: The name of the government of the Chinese Soviet Republic after the Long March reached Northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期新疆省的行政管理机构。
description.en: The administrative body of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 国民党的情报机构之一，参与了对新疆中共党员的审讯。
description.en: One of the intelligence agencies of the Kuomintang, which participated in the interrogation of CCP members in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中央红军的战略转移，毛泽民在此期间负责后勤供给工作。
description.en: The strategic retreat of the Central Red Army, during which Mao Zemin was responsible for logistical supplies.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省湘潭市，是毛泽民的出生地。
description.en: Located in Xiangtan, Hunan Province, China, it is the birthplace of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区首府，毛泽民在此地工作并被杀害。
description.en: The capital of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, where Mao Zemin worked and was killed.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民是毛泽东的弟弟。
description.en: Mao Zemin is Mao Zedong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民是毛泽覃的哥哥。
description.en: Mao Zemin is Mao Zetan's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 1922年冬，毛泽民加入中国共产党。
description.en: In the winter of 1922, Mao Zemin joined the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 1931年11月，毛泽民被任命为国家银行行长，负责筹建该银行。
description.en: In November 1931, Mao Zemin was appointed as the Governor of the State Bank and was responsible for its establishment.

relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行
中华苏维埃工农民主政府

position.zh-cn: 财政厅副厅长、代理厅长
position.en: Deputy Director and Acting Director of the Finance Department
Director of the Civil Affairs Department

description.zh-cn: 在长征期间，毛泽民任十五大队队长，负责整个中央红军的筹粮、筹款和后勤供给工作。
description.en: During the Long March, Mao Zemin served as the captain of the 15th Brigade, responsible for fundraising, grain collection, and logistical supplies for the entire Central Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 盛世才以“谈话”为名扣押了毛泽民，并最终于1943年9月27日下令将其秘密处决。
description.en: Sheng Shicai detained Mao Zemin under the pretext of a 'talk' and ultimately ordered his secret execution on September 27, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 盛世才扣押了陈潭秋，并最终于1943年9月27日下令将其秘密处决。
description.en: Sheng Shicai detained Chen Tanqiu and ultimately ordered his secret execution on September 27, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 盛世才扣押了林基路，并最终于1943年9月27日下令将其秘密处决。
description.en: Sheng Shicai detained Lin Jilu and ultimately ordered his secret execution on September 27, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 1943年9月，蒋介石批示同意对毛泽民处以极刑。
description.en: In September 1943, Chiang Kai-shek approved the death sentence for Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，盛世才投靠蒋介石，转而采取反苏反共政策，并扣押、杀害了在新疆工作的中共党员。
description.en: In 1942, Sheng Shicai defected to Chiang Kai-shek, adopted an anti-Soviet and anti-communist policy, and detained and killed CCP members working in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 多次向国民党当局交涉，要求释放被盛世才扣押的毛泽民等人。
description.en: Repeatedly negotiated with the Kuomintang authorities, demanding the release of Mao Zemin and others detained by Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，张治中出任新疆省主席后，释放了被盛世才长期关押的129名共产党员及家属。
description.en: In 1946, after becoming the Chairman of Xinjiang Province, Zhang Zhizhong released 129 CCP members and their families who had been imprisoned by Sheng Shicai for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: Defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: Defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆被捕后叛变。
description.en: Defected after being arrested in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 其叛变行为导致中统审讯人员知晓了陈潭秋的真实身份，加剧了对陈的迫害。
description.en: His defection led to the Central Bureau of Investigation and Statistics interrogators learning Chen Tanqiu's true identity, intensifying his persecution.

description.zh-cn: 其叛变行为导致中统审讯人员知晓了陈潭秋的真实身份，加剧了对陈的迫害。
description.en: His defection led to the Central Bureau of Investigation and Statistics interrogators learning Chen Tanqiu's true identity, intensifying his persecution.
